review: I cannot get it to hook up to the internet without it dropping access every two minutes.
author: Steve

review: There are plenty of reviews from people who are much more tech savvy then me. Sorry, no tech talk from me. Just why I like the firestick.1. I love having access to all the prime content that comes with my membership. Also with the allcast app on my phone, I'm able to stream content off my phone.2. It was super easy to set up and I like that I can use my phone as a remote. I'll eventually get some gaming controls,  so I can play games with my family.3. My mom (who's barely tech savvy) can use it with ease and thats definitely worth a good review in my book.4. The firestick is easy to take with you whenever you go, all you need is wifi.
author: sonya campos

review: I love the Fire TV Stick!  Just wish there were more recent good movies in prime.
author: Mima Piar

review: Works great as an upgrade from Chromecast.
author: B. Crutcher
